snippet.title: The Ebbing - A Coastal Tale | Announcement Trailer | Gamescon 2023 | Artivz
snippet.description:
It's the year 1870. You have to solve the mysterious death of Bente Hansen: question the villagers, detect clues, combine them to new information and decipher the mysterious signals that arrive at the station of the first transatlantic telegraph cable in a little village on the northsea coast.

The Ebbing - A Coastal Tale | Announcement Trailer | Gamescon 2023 | Artivz
